dmca.title: FW: [EV1-C2515060Q] Potential Copyright Infringement
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

The URLs in question are currently not accessible as of 9:09:07 a.m.
(GMT-6) on January 12, 2007.

Legal Response Team
 
> -----Original Message-----
> From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com]
> Sent: Wednesday, January 10, 2007 10:19 AM
> To: Copyright
> Subject: [EV1-C2515060Q] Potential Copyright Infringement
> 
> ==== Forwarded Ticket ====
> 1. Potential Copyright Infringement
> Added by system at Wednesday, Jan 10 2007 04:17 pm
> X-MailFrom: matt@kronenbergerlaw.com
> X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net
> Received: from [172.16.220.10] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for 
> <abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net>; Wed Jan 10 16:17:37 2007

> DALD2EXCH01.PLANET.LOCAL with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830);
>   Wed, 10 Jan 2007 16:13:51 -0600

> id 2C3CF45AEB  for <abuse@ev1servers.net>; Wed, 10 Jan 2007 16:13:49 
> -0600
> (CST)
> Received: from maila24.webcontrolcenter.com [216.119.106.19] by 
> gwa3.webcontrolcenter.com with SMTP;
>    Wed, 10 Jan 2007 15:13:23 -0700
> Received: from adsl-69-228-173-197.dsl.snfc21.sbcglobal.net
> [69.228.173.197] by maila24.webcontrolcenter.com with SMTP; 
>    Wed, 10 Jan 2007 15:12:47 -0700
> Reply-To: <matt@kronenbergerlaw.com>
> From: "Matt Thomson" <matt@kronenbergerlaw.com>
> To: <abuse@ev1servers.net>
> X-ASG-Orig-Subj: Potential Copyright Infringement
> Subject: Potential Copyright Infringement
> Date: Wed, 10 Jan 2007 14:12:44 -0800
> Message-ID: <002001c73504$74889d40$0565a8c0@kronenbergerlaw.local>
> MIME-Version: 1.0
> Content-Type: multipart/alternative; 
>         boundary="----=_NextPart_000_0021_01C734C1.66655D40" 
> X-Mailer: Microsoft Office Outlook 11
> Thread-Index: Acc1BHPpqlOENdu7QRqRpzudQWMYkg==
> X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V6.00.2900.2670
> X-Virus-Scanned: by Barracuda Spam Firewall at ev1servers.net
> X-Barracuda-Spam-Score: 0.00
> X-Barracuda-Spam-Status: No, SCORE=0.00 using global scores of 
> TAG_LEVEL=4.0 QUARANTINE_LEVEL=1000.0 KILL_LEVEL=8.0 WHITELISTED
> Return-Path: matt@kronenbergerlaw.com
> X-OriginalArrivalTime: 10 Jan 2007 22:13:49.0487 (UTC) 
> FILETIME=[9AB25BF0:01C73504]
> 
>  (multipart/alternative)
> Multipart prefix (text/plain)
> This is a multi-part message in MIME format. 
>  
> MIME element (text/plain)
> Dear Sir or Ma'am: 
>  
>   
>  
> I am writing on behalf of our client Kimberly Slavicek.  Mrs. Slavicek

> has been the victim of numerous instances of copyright infringement at

> numerous websites, and we have diligently tracked down and removed all

> such infringements.  Currently, the phrase "Kimberly Slavicek 
> scottsdale" is returned as search term results for two web pages:
> <http://www.w3hooker.com/3/Minsk+Brides.html>
> www.w3hooker.com/3/Minsk+Brides.html and 
> <http://www.w3massage.com/3/Erotic+Massages.html>
> www.w3massage.com/3/Erotic+Massages.html, which currently reside on 
> your server.  We feel strongly that copyright infringement is 
> occurring in connection with Mrs. Slavicek's name; however, due to the

> fact that there is a rotating script and the web pages are constantly 
> redirected to different websites, we are unable to pinpoint the actual

> infringement.  We have contacted the webmaster of the web pages, 
> Phuket Hosting Services, and they remain uncooperative.  Mrs. Slavicek

> is eager to distance herself from these websites, and we kindly 
> request that you disable the web pages located at 
> <http://www.w3hooker.com/3/Minsk+Brides.html>
> www.w3hooker.com/3/Minsk+Brides.html and 
> <http://www.w3massage.com/3/Erotic+Massages.html>
> www.w3massage.com/3/Erotic+Massages.html.  Your assistance with this 
> matter
> is greatly appreciated.   
>  
>   
>  
> Should you have any questions, please me at (415) 955-1155 x115, or at

> matt@kronenbergerlaw.com.   
>  
>   
>  
> Thank you. 
>  
>   
>  
> Sincerely,
>  
> Matt Thomson
>  
>   
>  
>   
>  
> Matthew M. Thomson
>  
> Associate
>  
> KRONENBERGER BURGOYNE, LLP
>  
> 150 Post Street, Suite 520
>  
> San Francisco, CA 94108
>  
> Phone: (415) 955-1155 x115
>  
> Fax: (415) 955-1158
>  
> matt@kronenbergerlaw.com

> www.kronenbergerlaw.com
>  
>

>
